linea
=====

This is the documentation for linea, a linear detrending package written in
Python for analyzing observations from the CHEOPS mission. linea is open source
and `available on GitHub <https://github.com/bmorris3/linea>`_.

  linea/background.rst
  linea/phasecurve.rst
  linea/eclipse.rst
  linea/index.rst
